properties.entry: SELECT FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME TITLEIMG ,PRODUCT_NAME ,USER_ID ,R.CREATE_DATE CREATE_DATE ,R.COUNT COUNT FROM REVIEW R JOIN PRODUCTS P ON (R.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN MEMBER B ON (R.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) JOIN REVIEW_ATTACHMENT RA ON (R.REVIEW_NO = RA.REVIEW_NO) WHERE R.USER_NO = ? AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
